articles.title: Resources to help you begin your R coding journey
articles.contents:
Contents
Taster
Using R in the classroom
Setting up RStudio
Cloud
Creating a
new R Project (RStudio Cloud & Desktop)


Taster
Check out 3 online, interactive lessons to see the cool things you
can do with R (these lessons use the learnr package)
Draw boxplots
Generate
sequences
Representing
data with boxplots
Using R in the classroom
Setting up RStudio Cloud


Packages used in all the lessons: tidyverse,
leaflet, ggeasy, astsa
Creating a new R
Project (RStudio Cloud & Desktop)

articles.title: R-Girls Website - Tutorial
articles.contents:
Home
          
          
          Getting Started
          
          
          Lessons
           
          ▾
          
          
          My 1st R Markdown Lesson
          Math Lessons
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              R-Girls Website - Tutorial
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                         Twitter
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                         GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Welcome!
            We are delighted to announce that we are setting up a
            worldwide network to promote the use of R - a leading data
            science programming language - in secondary schools for
            girls.
            This site is aimed primarily at teachers who want to use
            R in their lessons. On this website, you can find details
            on:
            Getting Started
            Ready made Math, Science and Geography lessons.
            Or, join us for a friendly chat on Slack
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              R-Girls Website - Tutorial
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                       Twitter
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                       GitHub
